text: Andromeda Heights is the sixth studio album by British band Prefab Sprout. It was released on 2 May, 1997 through Kitchenware Records and went to number 7 in the United States. Two tracks from the album were released as singles and made the top 60 on the single charts. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1997 albums Category:Prefab Sprout albums
title: Andromeda Heights
